users cascade Hibernate: create table categories ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint categories_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table document_types ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(50) not null, description varchar(255), primary key (id), constraint document_types_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table inventory_limits ( id bigint generated by default as identity, location_id bigint not null, max_stock bigint check (max_stock>=1), min_stock bigint not null check (min_stock>=0), product_id bigint not null, primary key (id), constraint uk_product_location_limits unique (product_id, location_id) ) Hibernate: create table inventory_movements ( quantity integer not null, unit_cost numeric(10,2), created_by bigint not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, inventory_stock_id bigint not null, movement_date timestamp(6) not null, movement_type_id bigint not null, order_id bigint, product_id bigint not null, notes varchar(500), reference varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table inventory_stock ( created_at timestamp(6) not null, current_stock bigint not null check (current_stock>=0), id bigint generated by default as identity, location_id bigint not null, product_id bigint not null, updated_at timestamp(6) not null, primary key (id), constraint uk_product_location unique (product_id, location_id) ) Hibernate: create table locations ( active boolean not null, created_at timestamp(6) not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, updated_at timestamp(6) not null, phone varchar(20), name varchar(100) not null, description varchar(500), address varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint uk_location_name unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table movement_types ( affects_stock boolean not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(50) not null, description varchar(255), primary key (id), constraint movement_types_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table order_details ( quantity integer not null check (quantity>=1), subtotal numeric(10,2) not null, unit_price numeric(10,2) not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, order_id bigint not null, product_id bigint not null, product_notes varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table order_statuses ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(50) not null, description varchar(255), primary key (id), constraint order_statuses_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table orders ( is_paid boolean not null, total_amount numeric(10,2) not null, completed_date timestamp(6), created_at timestamp(6) not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, location_id bigint not null, order_date timestamp(6) not null, order_status_id bigint not null, payment_method_id bigint, table_id bigint, updated_at timestamp(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, order_number varchar(255) not null unique, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table payment_methods ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(50) not null, description varchar(255), primary key (id), constraint payment_methods_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table permissions ( id bigint generated by default as identity, resource_id bigint, description varchar(255), name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint permissions_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table product_compositions ( quantity float(53) not null, composite_product_id bigint not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, ingredient_product_id bigint not null, unit_of_measure_id bigint not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table product_types ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(50) not null, description varchar(255), primary key (id), constraint product_types_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table products ( active boolean not null, purchase_price numeric(10,2) not null, sale_price numeric(10,2) not null, created_at timestamp(6) not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, product_type_id bigint not null, subcategory_id bigint not null, unit_of_measure_id bigint not null, updated_at timestamp(6) not null, description varchar(255) not null, name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table resources ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint resources_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table role_has_permission ( assigned_at timestamp(6) not null, assigned_by bigint not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, permission_id bigint not null, role_id bigint not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table roles ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(30) not null, description varchar(100), primary key (id), constraint roles_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table subcategories ( category_id bigint, id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table tables ( active boolean not null, capacity integer not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, location_id bigint not null, description varchar(255), number varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint uk_table_number_location unique (number, location_id) ) Hibernate: create table units_of_measure ( id bigint generated by default as identity, symbol varchar(10) not null, name varchar(50) not null, primary key (id), constraint units_of_measure_name_key unique (name) ) Hibernate: create table users ( active boolean not null, created_at timestamp(6) not null, document_type_id bigint not null, id bigint generated by default as identity, last_login timestamp(6), location_id bigint not null, role_id bigint not null, updated_at timestamp(6) not null, document varchar(50) not null, email varchar(255) not null, last_name varchar(255) not null, name varchar(255) not null, password varchar(255) not null, username varchar(255) not null, primary key (id), constraint uk_user_username unique (username), constraint uk_user_email unique (email), constraint uk_user_document unique (document) ) Hibernate: alter table if exists inventory_limits add constraint
